```{r}
# load libraries

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
# read in csv

a1_path = "/courses/EDS214/group_project/2024/triple_threat/Raw_Data"

q3 <- read_csv(file.path(a1_path, "QuebradaCuenca3-Bisley.csv")) %>% clean_names()
```

```{r}
q3_tidy <- q3 %>%
  mutate(year = sample_date) %>%
  filter(between(year, as.Date('1988-01-01'), as.Date('1994-12-31'))) %>%
  select(year, no3_n, k)
  
```
